file_insights.changes_summary: Added comprehensive multi-brand platform comparison between Vendure and Medusa 2.0

patterns_discovered: Detailed evaluation of headless commerce platforms
Structured decision matrix for platform selection
Infrastructure and cost comparison between platforms
gotchas_discovered: Vendure has steeper learning curve despite better multi-brand capabilities
Each platform has distinct strengths for different multi-brand scenarios
Infrastructure costs vary significantly between single and multi-instance approaches
recommendations: Choose Vendure for shared infrastructure and unified brand management
Select Medusa for completely independent brand evolution
Consider infrastructure costs and scaling requirements
Evaluate team's technical familiarity with REST vs GraphQL
Prioritize long-term maintainability over initial development speed
